mean_cn: n.下属；部下；  adj.次要的；从属的；下级的；  v.使从属于；使处于次要地位（读作/səˈbɔrdənɪt/）
mean_en: a person who has a position with less authority and power than somebody else in an organization
sentence: The status of subordinates is lower than their superior.
sentence_trans: 下属的地位比上司的地位要低。
word_etyma: sub在下面，次一等 + ordin顺序 + ate形容词后缀 → 顺序低一级 → subordinate下级的
